original_text: These things happened to them as examples and were written down as warnings for us, on whom the culmination of the ages has come.
korean_text: 그들에게 일어난 이런 일은 본보기가 되고 또한 말세를 만난 우리를 깨우치기 위하여 기록되었느니라

sentences.original_text: These things happened to them as examples
and were written down as warnings for us
on whom the culmination of the ages has come
